description.en: Reach the very top of Qingyun Peak.
Reach the top of the tower in Stormterror's Lair.

name.en: "Seeds of Stories, Brought By the Wind..."

description.en: Reach the nameless island northeast of Mondstadt.
Open the chest in the middle of the heart-shaped rock formation.
Pass through the time tunnel in the skies of Cape Oath.
Take a seat in the hands of the God Statue in Mondstadt.
Unlock the secrets of two sundials.
Hear the story of a bygone deity.
Learn about the tale of the Chi.
Fetch a good price for a treasure found in an ancient ruin...

name.en: The Best Sword in the Cemetery

description.en: Unlock the Tri-Seal of the Sword Cemetery.
Help Vermeer get the scenery of his dreams.
Play a simple game with Childish Jiang.

name.en: Trees Should Blend Their Roots and Shade, For That Is Where the Home is Made

description.en: Witness the story of Yuan Hong's household.
Follow in the footsteps of immortals, and unlock the Domain's door.
Return the Seelie to their rightful places and unlock the entrance to a Domain in Wolvendom.
Follow the Seelie and light the torches to unlock the entrance to a domain in Wuwang Hill.

name.en: "If you put your heart into it..."

description.en: Cook 1 suspicious-tasting dish.
Cook 10 suspicious-tasting dishes.
Be defeated by a wild boar.
Glide a long, long distance in one go.

name.en: It's the Same As Having Wings

description.en: Glide continuously for over 80s.
Sprint continuously (or use an alternative sprint) for over 15s.
Meet all sorts of people during your adventure.
Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Mondstadt.
Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Liyue.
Complete 10 Bounties.
Complete 20 Bounties.
Complete 30 Bounties.
Complete 10 Requests.
Complete 20 Requests.
Complete 30 Requests.
Lost track of a Bounty target.
Succumb to Sheer Cold...
Claim the treasure of the Entombed City.
Follow the path of one of the members of the long-lost investigation team to where they embarked on their journey home.
Discover the fate of a long-lost investigation team that once explored Dragonspine.
Obtain an ancient weapon made of Starsilver.
Discover the remains of many ruin machines.
Make an unexpected friend in an unexpected location.
Reach the summit of Dragonspine.
Discover a Cryo Crystalfly beneath a snow pile.
Be defeated by The Great Snowboar King.
Defeat The Great Snowboar King while the latter is in berserker mode.
Learn to make Goulash.
Get struck by lightning.
Climb the Skyfrost Nail after it has been restored.
Use the Parametric Transformer to complete one material transmutation.
Crush all of a Geo Hypostasis' Rock Pillars of Revival before it can be revived.
Break all of an Electro Hypostasis' Revival Prisms before it can be revived.
Absorb all of an Anemo Hypostasis' Wind Crystals before it can be revived.
Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis before it can absorb any crystals.
Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis that has undergone 4 types of Elemental Conversions.
Paralyze a Ruin Guard by attacking its weak point.
Knock a Pyro Slime out of the hands of a Hilichurl Grenadier.
Defeat an opponent by Shattering the ice they are trapped in.
Gain over 1 minute's worth of continuous shielding through Crystallize Reactions.
Defeat a Stonehide Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.
Hit an opponent after falling for over 5s with a Plunging Attack.
Have 4 party members in the Full state at the same time.
Deal over 5,000 CRIT DMG.
Deal over 20,000 CRIT DMG.
Deal over 50,000 CRIT DMG.
Complete a Domain using 4 characters of the same Elemental Type.
Defeat a Cryo Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.
Defeat a Pyro Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.
Defeat Childe without any party member being marked and then hit by his follow-up attack.
There are places where one cannot simply dig Pyro Slimes out of the ground...
Destroy the Electro Hypostasis' barrier.
Have one character get hit by all three parts of the rock-paper-scissors attack consecutively.
Cause the same Geo Hypostasis to fall three times by destroying the Basalt Column that it is on.
Force the Geo Hypostasis into its revival state without destroying any Basalt Columns.
Absorb at least 10 Elemental Orbs created by the Anemo Hypostasis in a single battle.
Destroy the Blazing Seed created by a Pyro Regisvine.
Destroy a Cryo Regisvine's corolla weak point while it is performing its rotary spray attack.
Defeat a Fatui Agent while they are in their stealth mode.
Defeat a Cryo Cicin Mage while all her Cryo Cicins are currently active.

name.en: And You Call Yourself One of the Four Winds

description.en: Defeat an Anemoboxer Vanguard after having triggered all of their Elemental Absorptions.
Use a shield to counter a Geovishap's charging attack.
Use a shield to counter a Primo Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack.
Use a shield of a matching type (or a Geo shield) to counter a Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack and deal immense DMG.
Complete the Mondstadt Archon Quests.

name.en: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind

description.en: Complete "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."
Complete "For a Tomorrow Without Tears."

name.en: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

description.en: Complete "Song of the Dragon and Freedom."
Obtain the power of Anemo.
Banish the dragon attacking Mondstadt.
Become an Honorary Knight of Favonius.
Fail to borrow the Holy Relic... but learn of the Knights' dilemma.
Be rescued by Dvalin.
Complete "Of the Land Amidst Monoliths"
Complete "Farewell, Archaic Lord."
Be rescued by an outsider at the "tourist spot that locals don't go to."
Agree to play with Dusky Ming.
Figure out which perfume Rex Lapis is fond of.
Clean Madame Ping's teapot.
Commission others to finish your work, unfettered by such things as Mora.
You failed to find the Cocogoat... but manage to repair a mechanism.
Prepare everything necessary for the Rite of Parting.
Create a box of lovely, jubbly Sugar-Frosted Slimes.
Reach Liyue's "mansion in the sky".
Sing a song of Mondstadt to the Glaze Lilies...

name.en: I'll Let You Off... This Time

description.en: Defeat Childe.
Defeat the Overlord of the Vortex.
Take part in the Rite of Parting.
Complete "A New Star Approaches".
Complete the quest "Bough Keeper: Dainsleif".
Play a game of pirates with Little Lulu, Little Fei, and Little Meng.
Complete "Fishing Jiangxue" and "Yanxiao's Dilemma."
In "Good Sign," help Zhihua find 5 signs that romance is coming his way.
Finish "Whispers in the Wind" 5 times.
Help Huai'an repair Wangshu Inn's broken bridge.
Select the highest-value jade on your first try.
Apologize to Timmie.
Only bring materials for a training dummy to Herman.
Expose Marjorie and receive Jack's thanks.
Hear Timmie's story.
Cure Anna's illness.
Witness Jilliana's tale.
Complete the mysterious cocktail.
Complete "The Lost Relic" and "A Little Raid."
Complete "So-called Work" and receive Linling's poetry anthology.
Complete the quest "For Old Time's Sake."
Steal a peek at Chang the Ninth's draft manuscript.
Ruin 4 signs of an imminent romance.
Consume the food during "Food Delivery"...?
